domo.educational.mvc

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • domo.educational.mvc.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractObserverInterface

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements AbstractObserverInterface
    Author:
    Stefano Falzaresi Stefano.Falzaresi2@studio.unibo.it this is the Controller part of the MVC pattern for this project. the Controller gets information from the user input (the View), change data on the Model and update the View, in this case the model is composed by some classes related to our Domotic Project

      Controller(ViewInterface tView)
      This is the constructor of the controller .

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void newProject(java.lang.String imagePath)
      New project is setted when the user press new and is used to create a new flat and set an image on it.
      java.lang.String openProject(java.lang.String fileName)
      Open project restore a flat and its image from a backup file, the image to use is passed to the view.
      void saveProject(java.lang.String fileName)
      Save project create a backup instance and save flat name and image to a txt file.
